attributes.action: make "post-16" transport to school free for sixth formers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, in many parts of Britain, when pupils move up from high school to sixth form, they are then required to pay several hundred pounds for the right to travel there - often on the same bus they have travelled on free of charge for the last 5 years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
